mapper.sql: a.service_organ_id AS "serviceOrganId", a.phone AS "phone", a.address AS "address", a.email AS "email", a.work_time AS "workTime", a.introduce AS "introduce", a.duty AS "duty", a.service_tenet AS "serviceTenet", a.three_aid AS "threeAid", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", group_concat(u.name) AS "userName"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u10 ON u10.id = a.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u on find_in_set(u.id,a.user_id)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM service_organ a
WHERE a.service_organ_id = #{id} GROUP BY a.service_organ_id

SELECT
FROM service_organ a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.phone LIKE '%'||#{phone}||'%' '%'+#{phone}+'%' concat('%',#{phone},'%')
AND a.address LIKE '%'||#{address}||'%' '%'+#{address}+'%' concat('%',#{address},'%')
AND a.email LIKE '%'||#{email}||'%' '%'+#{email}+'%' concat('%',#{email},'%')
GROUP BY a.service_organ_id
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO service_organ( service_organ_id, phone, address, email, work_time, introduce, duty, service_tenet, three_aid, user_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{serviceOrganId}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{email}, #{workTime}, #{introduce}, #{duty}, #{serviceTenet}, #{threeAid}, #{user.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE service_organ SET phone = #{phone}, address = #{address}, email = #{email}, work_time = #{workTime}, introduce = #{introduce}, duty = #{duty}, service_tenet = #{serviceTenet}, three_aid = #{threeAid}, user_id = #{user.id}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE service_organ_id = #{serviceOrganId}
